ygData.subject: I hope it stays a secret...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Folks, I m torn, I have to admit wanting to know about the pole, but dang it, if I were to spend several hundred/thousand plat trying to figure something
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Folks,

I'm torn, I have to admit wanting to know about the pole, but dang it, if I were to spend several hundred/thousand plat trying to figure something out I sure as hell would not want to just give it away either to some joe with a skill of 50 =P.

I would at least want a bit of time to get a jump on the competition before giving away my hard earned secrets.

Thats why most of the EQ fan sites are not posting the location of newly found magic items, cuz they know if they did, a flock of players would swarm the place.

I'll figure it out eventually any way =)

Cheers,

"FizzWizz" on tunare
